programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Rejs un Debra nevar iedomāties neko, par ko runāt. Debra domā, ka viņiem jāpavada vairāk laika kopā.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Dvīņi vēlas skolas ludziņā būt fejas.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Endijs atgriezies ofisā pēc dusmu kontrolēšanas kursa noslēgšanas, apņēmies sākt dzīvi no jauna ar visiem Dunder Mifflin darbiniekiem. Tajā pat laikā ofisā notiek drošības treniņi un Maikls ar Dvaitu aizsākuši misiju izgaismot briesmas, kas valda birojā.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls mēģina proaktīvi novērst krīzi, bet tas situāciju tikai pasliktina. Tikmēr Andželai ir problēmas mācēt atvainoties klientiem, un Endijs uzzina noslēpumu par savu jauno draudzeni.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Džeks izstrādā jaunu attiecību stratēģiju, kuras pamatā ir filmas "The Great Escape" principi. Liza mēģina pierādīt, ka sievietes ir smieklīgas, un dzeltenā prese atklāj, ka Džennai ir 56 gadi.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Džeks izmanto Lizu kā "draugu" republikāņu līdzekļu vākšanai. Visa TGS komanda kļūst neapmierināta, jo Džennas Džimija Bafeta atdarinātā dziesma piesaista jaunu, bet kaitinošu auditoriju.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Sema cenšas iekarot Britu, izdarot uzlabojumus viņas dzimšanas dienas ballītē. Diemžēl Sema netika uzaicināta, un viņa atstāj Felisiju novārtā. Tikmēr, kad ierodas Semas probācijas dienesta darbinieks, Kerola cenšas saviem draugiem izskaidrot Semas "situāciju".

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Sema saskaras ar savu līdz šim grūtāko izaicinājumu - izvairīties no alkohola Svētā Patrika dienā Bostonā; Brita dod Semai negaidītu iespēju atjaunot viņu draudzību; Džeimss un Mindija meklē viņa pazaudētās atslēgas, cīnoties ar Svētā Patrika dienas kārdinājumiem.

programme.title: Mūsdienu ģimene
programme.desc: Džejs rīko nakšņošanu saviem mazbērniem, bet Heilija meklē izeju. Klēra mēģina sagādāt Filam perfektu jubilejas dāvanu. Mičels un Kamerons atklāj, ka viņu draudzene ir traka un greizsirdīga uz viņu meitu.

programme.title: Mūsdienu ģimene
programme.desc: Fils un Klēra atceļ Ziemassvētkus saviem bērniem - viņiem jāatzīstas mājās pieļautajos pārkāpumos. Džejs vilcinās atzīt Glorijas un Menija svētku tradīcijas. Mičels un Kamerons aizved Liliju satikt Ziemassvētku vecīti.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Mis Mārplas draugs tēvs Gormans tiek atrasts noslepkavots. Kad viņa saņem sarakstu ar vārdiem, ko Gormans nosūtījis brīdi pirms nāves, viņa apņemas atrast drauga slepkavu.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Detektīvs Albergs izmeklē divu sieviešu noslēpumaino nāvi. Abas tika atrastas mežā dīvainās pozās.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Šajā sezonā varoņus gaidīs daudz piedzīvojumu. Brekenrīds un Mērdoks piedalīsies skotu spēlēs, Krebtrijam būs jādodas glābt savu tēvu un nāksies sastapties ar senu ienaidnieku, un Terenss Maierss lūgs Mērdoka palīdzību, kad būs apdraudēts premjera amata kandidāts. Bet viena no sērijām pirmo reizi būs uzņemta mūzikla stilā.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Šajā sezonā varoņus gaidīs daudz piedzīvojumu. Brekenrīds un Mērdoks piedalīsies skotu spēlēs, Krebtrijam būs jādodas glābt savu tēvu un nāksies sastapties ar senu ienaidnieku, un Terenss Maierss lūgs Mērdoka palīdzību, kad būs apdraudēts premjera amata kandidāts. Bet viena no sērijām pirmo reizi būs uzņemta mūzikla stilā.

programme.title: Džeina Eira
programme.desc: Bārene Džeina Eira kļūst par guvernanti Tornfīldholā. Pirmo reizi viņa jūtas kaut kur piederīga, tomēr kādā dienā viņu pamodina dīvainas skaņas.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Slavens burvju mākslinieks ir kā iekritis akā. Visa Londona apspriež šo noslēpumu, un kāda avīze nolīgst Elīzu veikt izmeklēšanu, neskatoties uz to, ka pie šīs lietas jau strādā Hercogs.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Ir 1940. gada pavasaris, un Skeldeilas namā visus gaida pārmaiņas. Džeimss un Helēna prāto, kad pienāks īstais brīdis ģimenes pieaugumam, nezinot, vai Džeimsu iesauks armijā vai ne. Tristana prombūtni sajūt visi, bet visskarbāk Zigfrīds, kurš cenšas uzturēt pieaugošo mājsaimniecību un braši turēties gaidāmo izaicinājumu priekšā. Uzplaukst Holas kundzes un Helēnas draudzība, abas lūkojas nākotnē. Un ierodas jauns veterinārijas students Ričards Kārmondijs, radot ķibeles mājā.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: 1964. g.: kad pazūd slavenā tante, kuru viņa nekad nepazina, Peregrīna Fišere manto negaidītu laimi un viņai jāpierāda, ka ir pietiekami apdāvināta, lai pati kļūtu par pasaules līmeņa privātdetektīvu.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Pirms prestižās Melburnas suņu izstādes pilsētā notiek aktīva darbība, tomēr kāds skandāls apdraud tā norisi, kad tiek atrasts kāds miris dalībnieks.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: 1850-tie gadi: bezbailīgā un ziņkārīgā Miss Skārleta vada tēva detektīvaģentūru ar inspektora Velingtona (Hercoga), kalpones Aivijas un Mozus palīdzību.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Ir 1940. gada pavasaris, un Skeldeilas namā visus gaida pārmaiņas. Džeimss un Helēna prāto, kad pienāks īstais brīdis ģimenes pieaugumam, nezinot, vai Džeimsu iesauks armijā vai ne. Tristana prombūtni sajūt visi, bet visskarbāk Zigfrīds, kurš cenšas uzturēt pieaugošo mājsaimniecību un braši turēties gaidāmo izaicinājumu priekšā. Uzplaukst Holas kundzes un Helēnas draudzība, abas lūkojas nākotnē. Un ierodas jauns veterinārijas students Ričards Kārmondijs, radot ķibeles mājā.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Šajā sezonā varoņus gaidīs daudz piedzīvojumu. Brekenrīds un Mērdoks piedalīsies skotu spēlēs, Krebtrijam būs jādodas glābt savu tēvu un nāksies sastapties ar senu ienaidnieku, un Terenss Maierss lūgs Mērdoka palīdzību, kad būs apdraudēts premjera amata kandidāts. Bet viena no sērijām pirmo reizi būs uzņemta mūzikla stilā.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Kad Gossigntonholas bibliotēkā tiek atrasts blondīnes līķis, Dollija Bentrija zina, ka būs nepieciešama visa iespējamā palīdzība, lai attaisnotu savu vīru Artūru.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā

programme.title: Tesa no dErbervilu cilts
programme.desc: Pēc traumatiskas tikšanās ar manipulatīvo Aleksu nabadzīgā Tesa mēģina atjaunot līdzsvaru savā dzīvē un iemīlas ideālistā Endželā. Kad par sevi atgādina pagātne, šīs jūtas tiek atklātas.

programme.title: Sisi
programme.desc: Napoleona III gāšana no troņa satrauc Vīnes politiskās aprindas. Francim šķiet, ka dēls ir jāsūta uz militāro skolu ātrāk, nekā plānots. Sisi pieņem lēmumu atbrīvot dēlu.

programme.title: Sisi
programme.desc: Sisi aizbēg no Vīnes kopā ar Rūdolfu un nevēlas atgriezties, kamēr Francis neļaus pašai audzināt dēlu. Abi dodas uz Francijas dienvidiem, kur viņiem izdodas pazust no sabiedrības redzesloka.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Pirms prestižās Melburnas suņu izstādes pilsētā notiek aktīva darbība, tomēr kāds skandāls apdraud tā norisi, kad tiek atrasts kāds miris dalībnieks.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: 1964. g.: kad pazūd slavenā tante, kuru viņa nekad nepazina, Peregrīna Fišere manto negaidītu laimi un viņai jāpierāda, ka ir pietiekami apdāvināta, lai pati kļūtu par pasaules līmeņa privātdetektīvu.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Attālā Francijas viesnīcā Elīza seko kādam krāpniekam. Viņa uzskata, ka beidzot ir notvērusi Skotlendjarda vismeklētāko noziedznieku. Tomēr arī citi viesnīcas viesi vēlas saņemt solīto atlīdzību.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Neviens nešķiet pārsteigts, kad pulkvedis Protero tiek atrasts noslepkavots vietējā draudzē. Apkārt ļoti daudz maldinošas informācijas, īpaši, kad atraitne un viņas mīļākais atzīstas slepkavībā.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Atvaļināts arheologs, vikāra sieva un vietējais suņu staidzinātājs izveido neticamu draudzību, vienlaikus cīnoties ar laiku, lai apturētu sērijveida slepkavu savā pilsētā.

programme.title: Džeina Eira
programme.desc: Bārene Džeina Eira kļūst par guvernanti Tornfīldholā. Pirmo reizi viņa jūtas kaut kur piederīga, tomēr kādā dienā viņu pamodina dīvainas skaņas.

programme.title: Hārdakri
programme.desc: Šis ir stāsts par strādnieku šķiras ģimenes Hārdakru dzīvi, mīlestību un ceļu uz bagātību 19. gs. beigu Jorkšīrā.

programme.title: Mesjē Speids
programme.desc: Speids ierodas Bazulā un iemīlas vīndarītavas īpašniecē. Viņš joprojām ir pensionējies atraitnis, kas bauda dzīvi mierā un klusumā. Tomēr ienaidnieka atgriešanās izjauc šo idilli.

programme.title: Mesjē Speids
programme.desc: Speids uzņemas risināt šausminošu slepkavības lietu, kas satricina vietējo pilsētiņu. Terēzai ir informācija, ko viņa neatklāj, Speids turpina izmeklēt, neapzinoties, ka var kļūt par nākamo upuri.

programme.title: "Vuelta a España". Bilbao–Bilbao (157,4 km)
programme.desc: Coverage of the Tour of Spain (also known as Vuelta A España). This renowned road cycling race is part of the UCI World Tour. Follow teams of world-class cyclists as they compete in-and-around Spain.

programme.title: Tennis: US Open
programme.desc: Coverage of one of the worlds most famous tennis tournaments; the US Open. programme.title: Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Новенькая
programme.desc: В элитную школу для детей богатых родителей попадает Вера - девушка из обычной семьи. Она сразу оказывается в центре запутанной детективной интриги и школьных конфликтов, и, конечно же, романтической истории. Но все не так просто: у Веры также есть тайна, и в элитном заведении она оказалась случайно...

Но все не так просто: у Веры также есть тайна, и в элитном заведении она оказалась случайно...

programme.title: Новенькая
programme.desc: В элитную школу для детей богатых родителей попадает Вера - девушка из обычной семьи. Она сразу оказывается в центре запутанной детективной интриги и школьных конфликтов, и, конечно же, романтической истории. Но все не так просто: у Веры также есть тайна, и в элитном заведении она оказалась случайно...

programme.title: Pirates of Somalia
programme.desc: In 2008, rookie journalist Jay Bahadur forms a half-baked plan to embed himself among the pirates of Somalia. He ultimately succeeds in providing the first close-up look into who these men are, how they live, and the forces that drive them.

programme.title: Dragon Blade
programme.desc: When corrupt Roman leader Tiberius arrives with a giant army to claim the Silk Road, Huo An teams up his army with an elite Legion of defected Roman soldiers led by General Lucius to protect his country and his new friends.

programme.title: Wake
programme.desc: When things get tough for offbeat Carys Reitman, she does what any emotionally isolated, modern girl would do - she goes to strangers funerals. At one fateful funeral, she unexpectedly meets Tyler, a man mourning his fiancee. Despite the warnings of her undertaker best friend Shane and her roommate Lila, she finds herself connecting to someone for the first time. Searching for answers, Carys goes to see her estranged mother to confront her past. And as she tries to open herself to the risks of love with Tyler, she realizes she may have more to fear than just a broken heart.

programme.title: Crossing Point
programme.desc: The girlfriend of a couple vacationing in Baja is kidnapped by a drug dealer who demands that her boyfriend smuggle back cocaine into the US or she will be killed.

programme.title: The Sandman
programme.desc: One fine morning, Benno finds sand in his bed. While he tries to ignore this at first, he soon must realize that he himself is loosing the sand. Day after day the sand increases and soon his time literally starts running short. Finally he is left no choice but to ask Sandra for help, who runs a small coffee shop under his apartment. Although Benno hates her with a passion, he started having dreams of her every night. What could Sandra and the dreams have to do with the sand?

programme.title: Scout Camp
programme.desc: The Fire Dragon patrol, with their ever-supportive scoutmaster, is headed to Camp Rakhouta for what should be the best week of their lives. But when the "Team Spirit Stick" of the camp goes missing, the entire tradition of the camp is threatened.

programme.title: Suits on the Loose
programme.desc: Two rebellious teens, on the run from a desert survival camp, steal the car of two naive Mormon missionaries. They end up in New Harmony, the town thats been anxiously awaiting their Mormon missionaries.

programme.title: Unexpected
programme.desc: Music critic Bob is out of a job, addicted to Zoloft, and trying to wrangle the menagerie of animals that his wife Amy has accumulated. Will adopting a baby cure their existential angst? Or should they just rescue another duck?

programme.title: Answer Me
programme.desc: A drama from 2004 produced in Italy, the script of which was based on the novel by Susanna Tamaro. A couple in love gets married, but when their first-born son comes to the world, the life of a young couple turns into hell.

programme.title: Caesar
programme.desc: Epic look at Julius Caesar, Romes last dictator, whose death also signaled the end of the Roman Republic. Chronicles his campaigns in Gaul and Egypt, his rivalry with General Pompey, and his eventual assassination at the hands of Brutus and Cassius.

programme.title: The Magnificent Ambersons
programme.desc: The spoiled rotten and utterly unlikable rich kid George Amberson becomes horrified when his recently widowed mother rekindles her relationship with the wealthy Eugene Morgan, who she left decades earlier in order to marry Georges father. As George struggles to sabotage his mothers new romance, he must deal with his own romantic feelings for Morgans daughter and the consequences of his meddling as his once great family falls into ruin due to his machinations...

programme.title: The Old Man and the Gun
Abduction
programme.desc: A man steps out of a park fountain in Ho Chi Minh City with no recollection of who he is or where he came from. As he wanders through the city, piecing together clues to his past, he is relentlessly pursued by mysterious figures.

programme.title: When Do We Eat?
programme.desc: A familys Passover gets screwy after the patriarch unknowingly ingests a hit of Ecstasy.

programme.title: The Promise
programme.desc: An epic fantasy adventure from director Chen Kaige (Farewell My Concubine). Nominated for a golden globe for best foreign language film.

programme.title: A Mothers Testimony
programme.desc: An ex-convicts mothers worst suspicions about her son are confirmed when he is implicated in a murder.

programme.title: The Phantom Father
programme.desc: The Phantom Father tells a story of an American professor Robert Traum, who takes a sabbatical from his teaching job to trace his roots in Romania. Traum soon discovers that he comes from a wealthy family involved in organized crime. He manages to reestablish contact with the sole remaining link to his otherwise deceased family—Sami. Rocco Castoro, the editor-in-chief of VICE magazine called the movie the best Romanian movie hes ever seen.

programme.title: Nico the Unicorn
programme.desc: A 12-year-old disabled boy, whose father recently passed away, has his life changed when the pony he rescues gives birth to a unicorn. Can he save the unicorn from the people who want to exploit it?

programme.title: Baba
programme.desc: An weird but witty old woman is forced to deal with an ambiguous future after her country, family and the entire system of values are ruined. She is trying to solve her existential problems catching d trying to sell a rewarded war criminal as he was a rabbit in a wood. The only thing she did not know if he is really him.

programme.title: Score: A Hockey Musical
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Farley has led a sheltered life, raised on a diet of home schooling, organic living and trips to the art gallery. To his parents dismay, Farley loves to play hockey with the local kids. To their even greater dismay, Farley is scouted and signed by the owner of a junior league team, where he becomes an instant star. But Farley discovers that stardom comes with a price - including the expectation to fight on the ice. Throw in a changing relationship with his best friend, and Farley finds himself losing his way.

programme.title: Almost Friends
programme.desc: Charlie, a culinary genius, has lost the motivation. He doesnt know what to with his life anymore, but he knows one thing - get close to Amber. In comparison to her boyfriend, he seems to be totally unattractive, but Charlies closest friend convinces him that where theres a will theres a way.

programme.title: Lost in Florence
programme.desc: A heartbroken American in Florence gets involved in a dangerous local sport -- and with an alluring local woman.

programme.title: Cookies Fortune
programme.desc: Cookies Fortune unfolds over an eventful Easter weekend in the small town of Holly Springs, Mississippi. The town residents are peaceful, kind folk--with the exception of Camille Dixon (Glenn Close) - a pushy theatre director with an incredibly shy younger sister, Cora (Julianne Moore), whose estranged daughter Emma (Liv Tyler) has just returned to town. On the heels of her latest play, Camille is shocked to discover that her Aunt Jewel Mae "Cookie" Orcutt (Patricia Neal) has committed suicide. Terrified at the thought of how this will tarnish the family name, she eats the suicide note to make it look like a burglary. This set-up leads the police to one main suspect, Willis Richland (Charles S. Dutton), who also happens to be Cookies best friend. Although the rest of the town is convinced Willis didnt commit the crime, an outside investigator (Courtney B. Vance) isnt so sure. As Easter Sunday and opening night of the play arrive, the truth comes out, revealing more secrets than anyone could have possibly imagined.

programme.title: Foolproof
programme.desc: Kevin, Samantha and Rob live for Foolproof; their own private club where through high-tech, meticulously thought out and executed plans, they pull off the most impossible of heists - all in theory that is. Theyve never actually done it for real. But all that changes when Leo, a cutthroat British gangster, rips off their foolproof plans for a diamond heist and uses it to successfully execute the robbery. Threatening to implicate them, Leo blackmails them to pull off a robbery worth $20 million in corporate bonds.

programme.title: Above and Beyond
programme.desc: Two cop partners, who are also best friends attend a domestic disturbance, only for one to accidentaly critically wound the other. The rest of the police force are suspicious that there may have been no accident.

programme.title: The Humanity Bureau
programme.desc: In the near future our government will decide who is expendable.

programme.title: Miss Nobody
programme.desc: Unlucky in love, living at home with her eccentric mom, and stuck in a dead end secretarial job at Judge Pharmaceuticals, Sarah Jane longs for more out of life. Her surprise promotion to junior executive appears to be just the ticket. But with promotion comes a competitive new world of wily, complicated executives, and Sarah Jane begins to eliminate the competition the only way she knows how - murder. During her climb to the top, she unexpectedly falls for the man of her dreams, Detective Bill Malloy - the cop intent on cracking the case of the mysterious deaths at Judge Pharmaceuticals.

programme.title: People You May Know
programme.desc: People You May Know follows Jed, a 30-something introvert who has managed to abstain from social media until now. When prompted with the gargantuan task of defining who he is, he realizes the life he can fake is much more interesting than the life he actually leads.

programme.title: Guči nams
programme.desc: Patrīzija Reggiani - ārzemniece no pazemīgiem sociālajiem slāņiem - ieprecas Gucci ģimenē. Viņas nevaldāmās ambīcijas sāk izjaukt mantojumu un iedarbina neapdomīgu nodevības, dekadences, atriebības un galu galā slepkavības spirāli.

programme.title: Es gribu tevi atpakaļ
programme.desc: Nupat kā par vientuļniekiem kļuvušie trīsdesmitgadnieki Pīters un Emma nolēmuši sadarboties, lai sabotētu savu bijušo jaunās attiecības un atgūtu viņus uz visiem laikiem.

programme.title: Robots vārdā Čapijs
programme.desc: Čaplijs - brīnumbērns. Kā jau jebkurš bērns, viņš nokļūs savas apkārtējās vides ietekmē un tikai viņa sirds un dvēsele palīdz atrast savu īsto ceļu. Tomēr ir viena lieta, kāpēc Čaplijs nav līdzīgs visiem pārējiem - viņš ir pirmais robots, kurš spēj just un domāt.

programme.title: Nevainojami
programme.desc: 1960. gadu Londonā vecāka gadagājuma apkopējs pārliecina uz lāpstiņām nospiestu vadītāju palīdzēt viņam nozagt dimantus no viņu darba devēja - Londonas Diamond Corporation.

programme.title: Blakusparādības
programme.desc: Pastāv uzskats, ka cilvēki spēj izmantot tikai 20 procentus savu smadzeņu. Vai varat iedomāties, kas notiktu, ja jūs spētu tās izmantot pilnībā? Pietiek ar vienu tableti, lai sasniegtu pilnību. Ko jūs darītu? Tiektos pēc slavas, varas? Cik tālu jūs būtu gatavi iet?

programme.title: Radio pirāti
programme.desc: Stāsts par negodīgu dīdžeju grupu, kas valdzināja Lielbritāniju - viņi spēlēja mūziku, kas raksturoja veselu paaudzi, kā arī nostājās pret valdību, kas ēterā vēlējās vien klasisko mūziku un neko citu.

programme.title: Bēgšana no Šoušenkas
programme.desc: Filma ir par baņķieri Endiju Defrēnu, kam piespriesti divi mūža ieslodzījumi par sievas un viņas mīļākā nogalināšanu. Cietumā viņš sadraudzējas ar Elisu Boidu "Redu" Redingu, Defrēns jūtas drošībā pēc tam, kad viņa zināšanas finanšu nozarē izmanto cietuma darbinieki un ieslodzītie.

programme.title: Pianists
programme.desc: Otrā pasaules kara laikā atzīts poļu mūziķis Vladislavs pazaudējis kontaktu ar savu ģimeni. Situācija kļūst aizvien sliktāka, un viņš izdzīvošanas nolūkos paslēpjas Varšavas drupās.

programme.title: Tēvi un meitas
programme.desc: Džeiks ir Pulicera balvu ieguvis rakstnieks, kurš traģiskā auto katastrofā zaudē savu mūža mīlestību un ir spiests vienatnē audzināt savu piecgadīgo meitu Keitiju. Pārvarējis vainas izjūtu par savas sievas nāvi, viņš cīnās gan ar ikdienas tēva pienākumiem, gan pret pārlieku valdonīgajiem radiniekiem, kuri grib atņemt viņam tēva tiesības un paši audzināt Keitiju.

programme.title: Gogēns. Ceļojums uz Taiti
programme.desc: Parīze, 1891. gads. Franču mākslinieks Pols Gogēns Parīzē jūtas nospiests un radoši iztukšojies. Viss apkārt šķiet samākslots. Ir jādodas uz Polinēziju pretī eksotiskam skaistumam! Diemžēl tā nedomā Gogēna sieva un viņa pieci bērni, kuri atsakās sekot līdzi Gogēnam uz "zudušo paradīzi".

programme.title: Sešas minūtes līdz pusnaktij
programme.desc: 1939. gada vasarā Tomass Millers pēdējā brīdī piekrīt kļūt par angļu valodas skolotāju Augustas-Viktorijas koledžā, kas atrodas Anglijas dienvidu krastā. Neskatoties uz politiskajām vētrām, kuru mākoņi samilst virs Eiropas, ietekmīgu Vācijas nacistu ģimeņu meitas šeit mācās etiķeti.

programme.title: Melnā kaste
programme.desc: Jauns, talantīgs analītiķis, kura specializācija ir lidmašīnu melnās kastes, mēģina atklāt traģiskas aviokatastrofas iemeslus.

programme.title: Supervaroņi
programme.desc: Stāsts par kādu pāri: Anna, karikatūriste ar impulsīvu personību, un Marko, fizikas skolotājs, pārliecināti, ka pār visu valda sava veida formula.

programme.title: 24 In
programme.desc: After more than 20 nonstop hours, the final chefs must create an elevated lunch and dinner to win $75,000 and the winning title!

programme.title: Harry Potter: Wizards of Baking
programme.desc: In a salute to Diagon Alley, hosts James and Oliver Phelps ask the baking teams to make 50 handheld desserts to feed a crowd of Harry Potter fans.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Summer Baking Championship
programme.desc: Jesse Palmer challenges the bakers to cook up sweet and savoury breakfast treats and turn lakeside berries into mile-high summer pies.

programme.title: The Last Day of the Dictator
Kur vēži dzied
programme.desc: Dēlijas Ouensas sensacionālā romāna ekranizācija vēsta par Kiju – pamestu meiteni, kura pieaugusi viena pati bīstamajā Ziemeļkarolīnas dumbrājā. Gadiem ilgi tuvējā pilsētiņā Bārklijkovā klīst baumas par "purva skuķi", kas nošķir Kiju no sabiedrības. Kad viņa piesaista divu vietējo puišu uzmanību, Kija atver sirdi jaunai un pārsteidzošai pasaulei, bet, kad viens no puišiem iet bojā, visu aizdomas nekavējoties krīt uz purva vientuļnieci.

programme.title: Morbiuss
programme.desc: Cenšoties atrast zāles savai retajai ģenētiskajai slimībai, bioķīmiķis Maikls Morbiuss nejauši inficējas ar vampīrisma vīrusu.

programme.title: Nedžentlmeniskas karadarbības ministrija
programme.desc: Neticams un noklusēts patiess stāsts par pašu pirmo īpašo spēku organizāciju, ko Otrā pasaules kara laikā dibināja Vinstons Čērčils un neliela militāro ierēdņu grupa. Slepenā kaujas vienība, ko veidoja raibum raiba neliešu un disidentu kompānija, devās riskantā misijā pret nacistiem, izmantojot neierastas un pilnībā "nedžentlmeniskas" cīņas tehnikas. Viņu bezbailīgā pieeja mainīja kara gaitu un ielika pamatus mūsdienu slepeno operāciju karadarbībai.

programme.title: Neviens tevi neglābs
programme.desc: No sabiedrības izolējusies un baiļu pārņemta sieviete spiesta cīnīties ar citplanētieti, kurš iekļuvis viņas mājā.

programme.title: Kā pieradināt pūķi
programme.desc: Ir pagājuši pieci gadi, kopš Hiks un Nezobs veiksmīgi apvienoja pūķus un vikingus uz Berkas salas. Kamēr Astrīda, Snūģis un pārējie sacenšas pūķu sacīkstēs (kas ir salas iemītnieku mīļākais sporta veids), nešķiramie draugi iepazīst apkārtni, veidojot līdz šim neatklāto teritoriju karti un atklājot jaunas pasaules. Kārtējā piedzīvojuma laikā viņi atklāj slepenu ledus alu, kur mīt vairāki simti savvaļas pūķu un noslēpumainais Pūķu Jātnieks. Hiku un Nezobu ierauj kaujā par miera saglabāšanu pasaulē. Tagad viņiem jācīnās par to, kam viņi tic, un tikai kopīgiem spēkiem draugi spēs mainīt cilvēku un pūķu nākotni.

programme.title: Trusītis Pēterītis 2: Mazais bēglis
programme.desc: Bea, Tomass un trusīši beidzot ir atraduši kopīgu valodu un vada mierīgu dzīvi laukos. Tomēr Pēterītis nespēj nosēdēt uz vietas – viņa dvēsele alkst piedzīvojumu. Tāpēc, izmantojot pagadījušos izdevību, mazais dumpinieks dodas iespaidu meklējumos uz pilsētu. Pēterīša lielā ģimene, riskējot ar visu, dodas viņu meklēt, un nu mazajam bēglim jāizlemj, kas viņam ir vissvarīgākais.

programme.title: Zemesriekstu sviesta piekūns
programme.desc: Zaks sirgst ar Dauna sindromu, un viņš dzīvo kopā ar savu aprūpētāju Elinoru.

programme.title: Alvins un burunduki. Aizburājuši
programme.desc: Burunduki nolemj doties atvaļinājumā ar smalku kruīza kuģi, kuru ātri vien pārvērš par savu rotaļu laukumu. Taču viņu izklaides un nebēdnības ātri vien beidzas, un viņi nonāk uz neapdzīvotas salas, kas pat nav atzīmēta kartē. Nu viņiem jādara viss iespējamais, lai atrastu veidu, kā nokļūt mājās. Viņi negaidot atklāj, ka sala nebūt nav neapdzīvota.

programme.title: Alvins un burunduki: Turpīkstinājums
programme.desc: Alvins, Saimons un Teodors pārceļas pie Deiva jaunākā krustdēla Tobija, un viņi izlemj, ka izglītība ir svarīgāka par lipīgu popdziesmiņu štancēšanu. Diemžēl skolas muzikālās apmācības programmai draud likvidēšana, un vienīgā iespēja to glābt ir 25 tūkstošu dolāru izcīnīšana gaidāmajā "grupu kaujā".

programme.title: Zirnekļcilvēks: Tālu no mājām
programme.desc: Pīters Pārkers kopā ar labākajiem draugiem dodas vasaras brīvdienās uz Eiropu. Tomēr no iecerētās atpūtas nekas nesanāks, jo Pīters piekritīs palīdzēt Nikam Fūrijam tikt skaidrībā, kas tās par noslēpumainajām būtnēm, kas izraisa katastrofas un postījumus visā kontinentā.

programme.title: Zirnekļcilvēks: Atgriešanās mājās
programme.desc: Sajūsmināts par pavadīto laiku kopā ar Atriebējiem, Pīters Pārkers ir atgriezies mājās, kur dzīvo kopā ar tanti Meju sava jaunā mentora Tonija Stārka uzraudzībā. Viņš cenšas dzīvot vienkāršu pusaudža dzīvi, tomēr nespēj nedomāt par to, ka varētu būt sabiedrībai noderīgs ar savām supervaroņa spējām. Kad pie apvāršņa parādās ļaundaris, viņam būs iespēja tās likt lietā!

programme.title: Slepenā mītne
programme.desc: Raiens Reinoldss tēlo jaunu CIP aģentu Metu Vestonu, kurš strādā slepenā mītnē Keiptaunā, Dienvidāfrikā, kad tiek notverts vismeklētākais bijušais CIP aģents Tobins Frosts (Denzels Vašingtons) un nogādāts šajā mītnē. Frosta nopratināšanas laikā mītnē iebrūk algotņi, kuri vēlas notvert Frostu. Vestons un Frosts izglābjas, taču viņi būs drošībā tikai tad, kad atradīs citu drošu mītni.

programme.title: Meklēšana
programme.desc: Kad pazūd Deivida Kima 16 gadus vecā meita, viņš pirmoreiz dzīvē iedziļinās meitas sociālo tīklu pasaulē, kura atklāj daudz vairāk, nekā sākotnēji šķita... Filma uzdod tiešus un neērtus jautājums, kas attiecināmu uz ikvienu, – cik daudz no sevis mēs mūsdienās uzticam sociālajiem tīkliem? Ko tie par mums stāsta, un kā ar mums ir iespējams manipulēt?

programme.title: Izbrauciens
programme.desc: Bens Bārbers (Kevins Hārts) gatavojas precēties ar saderināto Andželu (Tika Samptere), kura ir viņa policijas partnera Džeimsa (Aiss Kjūbs) māsa. Policistus nosūta uzdevumā uz Maiami, lai izmeklētu nežēlīgā narkotiku tirgoņa Antonio Poupa (Bendžamins Brats) nodarījumus, par kuru ir zināms, ka tas apgādā visu Maiami ar narkotikām. Viņi apvienojas ar bezkompromisu detektīvi Maju (Olīvija Manna) un dodas pārtraukt Poupa darbību. Spriedze palielinās, tuvojoties Bena un Andželas kāzām.

programme.title: Tikai drosmīgie
programme.desc: Uz patiesiem notikumiem balstīts stāsts par kādu ugunsdzēsēju vienību, kas ar savu varonību, apņēmību un spēju upurēties kļūst par vienu labākajām ugunsdzēsēju vienībām ASV. Kamēr vairums ļaužu izvairās no briesmām, viņi dodas tām pretī, sargājot citu cilvēku dzīvību, mājas un visu, kas tiem dārgs. Viņi kļūst kā brāļi, un tam ir īpaša nozīme, kad nākas stāties pretī kādam liktenīgam ugunsgrēkam. 2013. gada vasara. Arizonas štatā plosās postoši ugunsgrēki, un glābēju grupa dodas tos novērst. Aktieru vidū ir gan "Oskaram" nominētais Džošs Brolins, gan "Oskara" saņēmējs Džefs Bridžess.

programme.title: Manas lielās grieķu kāzas
programme.desc: Pēc ģimenes patriarha nāves Tula mēģina atrast sava tēva bērnības draugus Grieķijā, lai sarīkotu ģimenes atkalapvienošanos.

programme.title: Kā Grinčs nozaga Ziemassvētkus
programme.desc: Vūvila ir maza, brīnumaina pilsētiņa, kas atrodas sniegpārsliņā. Visiem Vūvivas iedzīvotājiem ļoti patīk Ziemassvētki. Taču pilsētiņas tuvumā mīt Grinčs – ļoti nejauks radījums, kuram riebjas gan Ziemassvētki, gan arī vūvilieši, jo tie savulaik viņu izstūmuši no sava vidus. Redzot, kā viņi priecājas un gaida svētkus, Grinčs nolemj nozagt visas Ziemassvētku dāvanas. Bet varbūt kādai mazai meitenītei izdosies sadraudzēties ar Grinču un likt viņam mainīt savus plānus?

programme.title: Zirnekļcilvēks: Ceļojums Zirnekļpasaulē
programme.desc: Fils Lords un Kristofers Millers, radošie prāti aiz "Lego filma" un "Džampstrīta 21", apvieno savus talantus un pieņem izaicinājumu – radīt unikālu skatījumu par komiksu pasaulē labi zināmo Zirnekļcilvēka visumu. Viņiem tas izdodas ar elpu aizraujošu stāstu un līdz šim neredzētu vizuālo noformējumu, pelnīti saņemot Oskaru par gada labāko animācijas filmu. "Zirnekļcilvēks. Ceļojums Zirnekļpasaulē" mūs iepazīstina ar jauno Maiklu Moralesu un vēl pieciem spilgtiem personāžiem no dažādām dimensijām, kuri apveltīti ar zirnekļ-supervaroņa spējām. Tikai darbojoties kopā, viņi var apturēt briesmas, kas apdraud visas realitātes.

programme.title: Auniņš Šons filma: Fermagedons
programme.desc: Netālu no auniņa Šona fermas ir avarējis piemīlīgās un draiskās citplanētietes Lu-Las kosmosa kuģis. Lu-Las neparasto spēju, nebeidzamo blēņu un galaktikas mēroga atraugu apburts, Šons nolemj palīdzēt savai jauniegūtajai draudzenei atgriezties mājās, nenojaušot, ka nežēlīga citplanētiešu mednieku organizācija jau dzen viņiem pēdas. Vai Šons un viņa bars spēs novērst Fermagedonu, pirms nav par vēlu?

programme.title: Krāpšanas ilūzija
programme.desc: Pagājis gads, kopš "Četriem jātniekiem" izdevās apvest ap stūri FIB. Viņi gaida ziņu no Acs – iluzionistu grupas, kura ir pieņēmusi viņus darbā. Daniels Atlass (Džese Aizenbergs) pats sāk savu izmeklēšanu, lai tos atrastu, kamēr nonāk līdz tehnoloģiju pavēlniekam Valteram Mebrijam (Daniels Redklifs), kurš "jātniekiem" uzdod nozagt datu iegūšanas ierīci. Pēc tam dzīve sagriežas virpulī, kurš ietekmē cilvēkus pagātnē, tagadnē un nākotnē.

programme.title: Girl You Know Its True: Milli Vanilli stāsts
programme.desc: Filmas centrā ir patiess stāsts par bēdīgi slaveno skandālu, kurā dejotāji Roberts Pilatuss un Fabriss Morvans kļuva slaveni astoņdesmito gadu beigās kā popmūzikas sensācija Milli Vanilli. Mūzikas producenta Frenka Fariana vadībā viņi kļuva par pasaules mēroga zvaigznēm, ar trim hitiem Nr. 1 ASV. Taču tikai neliels cilvēku loks zina, ka duets nevis dzied, bet sinhronizē lūpas ar divu citu mākslinieku balsīm. Savas slavas virsotnē Milli Vanilli iegūst Grammy balvu, taču, kad patiesība tiek atklāta, pasaule ir lieciniece vienam no lielākajiem skandāliem mūzikas vēsturē.

programme.title: Ātrs un bez žēlastības
programme.desc: Bijušais ieslodzītais Doms Toreto ir atgriezies Losandželosā, lai noskaidrotu patiesību, kas slēpjas aiz kāda augsta līmeņa nozieguma, bet viņa ierašanās pilsētā neapmierina aģentu Braienu OKoneru (Volkers). Abi sāncenši ir spiesti apvienot spēkus, lai uzveiktu kopīgu ienaidnieku, vienlaikus izbaudot ātras braukšanas mākslas jaunas un satraucošas robežas.

programme.title: Džumandži: Laipni lūgti džungļos
programme.desc: Četri vidusskolēni atrod vecu spēļu konsoli ar līdz šim neredzētu videospēli džumandži. Viņi iesaistās šajā spēlē, kas norisinās džungļos, un iemiesojas pašu izraudzītajos avataros. Jaunieši apjauš, ka džumandži ir kas vairāk par spēli, tā ir cīņa par izdzīvošanu. Lai uzvarētu spēlē, viņiem jādodas bīstamākajā piedzīvojumā mūžā, jāatklāj Alana Periša pirms 20 gadiem atstātās pēdas un jāmaina priekšstats pašiem par sevi, pretējā gadījumā viņi paliks ieslēgti spēlē uz visiem laikiem...

programme.title: Sātans "Pradas" brunčos
programme.desc: Žilbinošajā Ņujorkas modes pasaulē žurnāls "Runway" ir tikpat kā Svētā Grāla statusā. To ar manikirētu dūri vada Miranda Prīstlija – ietekmīgākā sieviete modes nozarē. "Runway" ir biedinošs izaicinājums jebkuram, kas vēlas gūt panākumus šai jomā. Lai padarītu "Runway" par Ņujorkas un tātad arī visas pasaules modes bībeli, Miranda nekam neļauj stāties sev ceļā – ieskaitot neskaitāmas asistentes, kas atlaistas, jo nav atbildušas neaptveramajām prasībām. Neviens sevi cienošs cilvēks nespētu paciest šādu darbu, tomēr miljoniem jaunu sieviešu šādas izdevības dēļ būtu gatavas uz visu.

programme.title: Džeisons Borns
programme.desc: Bijusī CIP slepenā aģente Nikija Pārsone (Džūlija Stailza) reiz palīdzēja Bornam (Mets Deimons), pēc tam nozuda un šobrīd strādā kopā ar ziņotāju, kurš gatavojas nodot atklātībā CIP slepenās specoperācijas. Nikija ielaužas CIP sistēmā un lejupielādē visu, kas saistīts ar specoperācijām, tostarp operāciju "Dzirnakmens", kurā piedalījās Borns. CIP aģente Hetera Lī (Alīsija Vikandere) atklāj ielaušanos un par to ziņo CIP direktoram Robertam Dūvijam (Tomijs Lī Džonss), kurš ir specoperāciju galvenais vadītājs.

programme.title: Kurš pēc kārtas?
programme.desc: Pēc kārtējām izjukušajām attiecībām Alija nolemj neielaisties attiecībās ne ar vienu citu, bet gan uzmeklēt savus bijušos, lai noskaidrotu, kurš no tiem ir viņas dzīves īstais vīrietis.

programme.title: Mans spiegs
programme.desc: Rūdītais CIP aģents Džeidžejs tiek pazemināts amatā un nosūtīts misijā novērot deviņgadīgās Sofijas ģimeni. Kad meitene atrod dzīvoklī slepenās kameras, viņa izseko to signālam un atklāj novērošanas operāciju pārraudzības vietu. Solot nenodot atklātībai Džeidžeja aizsegu, Sofija pierunā aģentu veltīt viņai laiku un apmācīt spiegošanas prasmēs. Lai gan sākotnēji piedāvājums viņā raisa skepsi, Džeidžejs aptver, ka gudrībā un atjautībā ar Sofiju viņš mēroties nevar.

programme.title: Robota bērns
programme.desc: Kādu pusaugu meiteni pazemes bunkurā gādīgi uzaudzina robots "Māte", kura uzdevums ir atjaunot cilvēku populāciju pēc cilvēces izmiršanas globālā katastrofā. Tomēr meitenes un robota īpašā saikne tiek apdraudēta, kad viņu patvērumā nez no kurienes ierodas svešiniece ar satraucošām ziņām.

programme.title: Basketbols: WNBA. Golden State - Washington
programme.desc: Get the best moments of the Womens National Basketball Association, a professional basketball league in the United States. It currently is composed of twelve teams. The regular season is played from May to September, the All Star game is played midway through the season in July and the WNBA Finals at the end of September until the beginning of October.

programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Rayo Vallecano - Barcelona
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: FIBA EuroBasket. Bosnia and Herzegovina - Georgia

programme.title: Cīņus sports: One Championship. ONE Friday Fights
programme.desc: Coverage from the ONE Championship; martial arts competitions which include mixed martial arts (MMA), Muay Thai, and kickboxing. Enjoy all the action with top-class competitors from across Asia and the world.

programme.title: Futbols: Scottish Premiership. Rangers - Celtic

programme.title: EČ basketbolā vīriešiem .. Bosnija un Hercegovina - Gruzija
Futbols: Serie A. Žurnāls Full Impact. 2. raidījums
Farmhouse Fixer
programme.desc: Singer Jonathan Knight demonstrates his renovation know-how skills. He has renovated more than 200 houses, while preserving their original craftsmanship. He has been in this for more than 25 years, and thanks to his passion and talent he updates interiors while keeping the historical charm and chic.

programme.title: Vintage Flip
programme.desc: Jessie and Tina Rodriguez take their passion for vintage homes to the next level. They find and buy historic homes to restore and sell at a profit.

programme.title: Vintage Flip
programme.desc: Jessie and Tina Rodriguez take their passion for vintage homes to the next level. They find and buy historic homes to restore and sell at a profit.

programme.title: Flipping 101 with Tarek El Moussa
programme.desc: Getting into property flipping can be daunting for first-timers, which is why Tarek El Moussa is on hand to share invaluable advice that will put them on course for handsome profits. With years in the industry, Tarek has seen and done it all. Now he wants to draw on some of his own experiences to ensure novice flippers dont make costly mistakes. Aided by Tareks knowledge and a few of his clients, surely nothing can go wrong? Reality series.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: House Hunters

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Pool Kings

programme.title: Rehab Addict
programme.desc: Rehab Addict is a TV show documenting home renovations, hosted by a charming designer Nicole Curtis. Nicole is a strong supporter of the idea of preservation and restoration of existing architecture when possible instead of its destruction. Her philosophy is to "restore old homes to their former glory" rather than modernization. She has revived historic homes in Michigan, Ohio and Minnesota and saved them from the wrecking ball. Nicole deals with the government bureaucrats, creates a team and together they go above and beyond to bring back former glory to the old buildings. Nicole is a bundle of energy and a perfect source of motivation and inspiration.

programme.title: Farmhouse Fixer
programme.desc: Singer Jonathan Knight demonstrates his renovation know-how skills. He has renovated more than 200 houses, while preserving their original craftsmanship. He has been in this for more than 25 years, and thanks to his passion and talent he updates interiors while keeping the historical charm and chic.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: Help! I Wrecked My House
programme.desc: American home improvement series. Presenter Jasmine Roth visits the homes of DIY catastrophes to restore them back to a liveable space. Jasmine brings in the professionals to rescue these renovations-gone-wrong and helps homeowners realise their propertys full potential. With half-demolished houses, unfinished floors and plumbing nightmares: these refurbishment mishaps are on a monumental scale. Luckily, with expertise, hard work and vision, Jasmine and her team can hopefully transform these DIY disasters into something beautiful that their owners will love.

programme.title: Windy City Rehab
programme.desc: Windy City Rehab is a reality renovation show hosted by interior designer Alison Victoria. She and her expert team buy and restore old homes in her beloved Chicago historic neighborhoods. It is much more than a simple improvement of a house. Alison and her team are rescuing vintage houses and hold true to the original style and architecture as much as possible. They do their best to pay tribute to the historic roots, while integrating some modern makeovers.

programme.title: Tiny Luxury
programme.desc: Husband and wife Tyson and Michelle Spiess are founders of Tiny Heirloom, a unique building company focussing on the construction of tiny, luxury homes. In this reality series we follow them as they construct homes under 400 square feet (37 square metres) into glorious, high-end, miniature mansions, showing that downsizing doesnt have to compromise comfort and style. Based in Portland, Oregon, the family run company helps customers fulfill their real estate dreams, squeezing every wish and request into these tiny homes, allowing them to enjoy every aspect of their new, pint-sized properties.

programme.title: Tiny House, Big Living
programme.desc: Documentary series showing the journey of people in America who are joining the tiny-house movement, where people are actively choosing to live in smaller houses. We follow the construction process of houses that are often less than 500 square feet. We see the challenges the builders face when constructing a small home and ingenuous space-saving ideas they come up with to make the most of the limited floorspace. This show meets single people, couples and families who explain how they reached this decision to downsize to a mini-home, or why they have picked a small house as their first home. For some this is a financial decision, trying to avoid the large cost of living that comes with a standard house. Others are doing this for ecological reasons. Some are following their dreams of a simpler lifestyle.

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home
programme.desc: Brian and Mika Kleinschmidt are a formidable husband and wife team. The married couple utilise Brians developing background and Mikas real estate experience to help clients design and build their perfect home in just 100 days. Based in Tampa, Florida, the formidable pair help local residents realise their dreams, and do all they can to ensure their ideal project is completed within the given time frame. Reality series.

programme.title: The UnBelievable with Dan Aykroyd
programme.desc: A blind man who uses bat-like powers of echolocation to navigate his surroundings? A samurai with reflexes faster than a speeding bullet? A man immune to electrocution? These are the strange tales of humans with superhuman powers.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum are in Seattle, Washington. In between throwing fish at Pikes Market, the guys are hoping to find gems in the Emerald city, with a little help from their experts.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Tony Harris separates the real from the fake in some of the most compelling Bigfoot evidence recently captured. Are footprint casts from Mt. St. Helens proof that a massive, undiscovered primate lives in North America?

programme.title: Clash of the Gods
programme.desc: Documentary series that in each episode explains the heroic and tragic life of various figures from Greek and Norse mythologies - the most powerful monsters, heroes and Gods, including Thor, Hercules, Beowulf, Minotaur, Odysseus and Zeus. Was ancient Greeces greatest hero Hercules a real person? What inspired the Minotaurs labyrinth? Did Odysseuss famous journey really happen? This series will answer these and many other questions, and experts will connect the myths we all know to actual historical events, and link the stories to mythologies of other cultures as well.

programme.title: Battles BC
programme.desc: Step back in time and revisit some of the most brutal battles that took place before Christ. Recreated with stunning technology, we reveal these violent conflicts like never before, examining the soldiers, strategies and weapons deployed by the powerful legions. From Hannibals clashes with Rome to Alexander the Greats pursuits throughout India, these conflicts have had a resounding impact on our history and with these reconstructions you will see the ferocious aspects of war in antiquity.

programme.title: Where Did It Come From?
programme.desc: Documentary series exploring the history of Earths greatest man-made structures and creations. Where Did It Come From? reveals the earliest examples of brilliance and ingenuity from past pioneers. From the Roman highway project; a civil engineering feat establishing a network of unprecedented highways, to Egypts iconic structures, this series reveals the incomprehensible ides brought to life by magnificent minds, and in some cases, brutal slavery. Join host Michael Guillen as he dives into this fascinating world of both civil and social engineering, born out of ideas we still use today.

programme.title: Cities of the Underworld
programme.desc: Budapest sits on top of an ancient secret. Follow Eric Geller as he uncovers a top secret WWII hospital and finds the source of the boiling healing water used by the Romans and the Turks in the caves beneath Budapest.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: Across North America there is something strange and frightening circling overhead. Witnesses tell of human-like creatures that float or hover in the skies and often descend to attack. Legends and folklore tell of strange flying creatures.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. programme.title: Doomsday: 10 Ways the World Will End
programme.desc: Theories of how the world will meet its end in this doomsday documentary as we follow scientist Trevor S. Valle as he hypothesises with others through the series. Looking into how the human race will be wiped out with each episode examining a different theory of how the planet will be destroyed. From being swallowed by a black hole, bombed by meteorites or overcome by aliens the series covers the most popular theories. An intriguing and interesting watch that will have you questioning how things out of this world could see the end of the earth.

programme.title: Engineering Disasters
programme.desc: Human error and right circumstances can become the recipe for a disaster and cause tragedies and serious accidents. When engineering goes wrong, trains carrying hazardous materials derail, luxury cruise ships wreck on the rocks, bridges collapse, construction cranes fall from the sky, bringing destruction and death.

programme.title: Cities of the Underworld
programme.desc: Historical documentary series that visits a range of diverse modern cities including Istanbul, New York, Rome, London, Cairo, and Sydney. By travelling underneath the streets and roads we use today, we learn about the fascinating pasts and ancient secrets of these incredible places.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: Chimpanzees are known to us as amusing circus attractions and are even popular as pets, but when they attack the results are frightening and horrific. Just as disturbing, across the US, witness reports suggest that chimpanzees may be on the loose.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. It has been fifty years since the man traveled to outer space, but there are too many secrets unrevealed. The series reconstructs life on other planets and galaxies, fantasizes about life and all its possible forms in other atmospheres. You can witness space accidents, parallel universe, the velocity of light and discover new facts about mysterious outer space.

programme.title: Cities of the Underworld
programme.desc: We go beneath the streets of Japan to see the latest technology that saves the city from the many natural disasters ready to strike. Head back in time to World War II to see how Hiroshimas underground offered protection from the most powerful bombs.

programme.title: The Curse of Civil War Gold
programme.desc: The Curse of Civil War Gold is a non-fiction series about American Civil War history. Michigan native, part time treasure hunter Kevin Dykstra and his team search for lost treasures of Civil War Gold, estimated to be worth millions of dollars. They join forces with Marty Lagina from The Curse of Oak Island trying to solve the mystery and find the lost gold. The story goes that Union soldiers tracked down Confederate president Jefferson Davis in 1865 and confiscated his gold. Later it was smuggled north and ended up in Lake Michigan. And this is exactly where Kevin and his crew head to.

programme.desc: No matter how far you run, or how much time passes, you cant escape your past. And for those who shared a life with an individual who became a killer, the past will always weigh heavy on their mind. This true-crime documentary series interviews loved ones of murderers to understand the impact and emotional turmoil that lingers over their life. In one act of violence, their lives would be changed forever.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here: Shadows Of Death
programme.desc: No matter how far you run, or how much time passes, you cant escape your past. And for those who shared a life with an individual who became a killer, the past will always weigh heavy on their mind. This true-crime documentary series interviews loved ones of murderers to understand the impact and emotional turmoil that lingers over their life. In one act of violence, their lives would be changed forever.

programme.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: Get the stories behind headlines as Tamron Hall takes and in-depth look at crimes that have taken place in the USA. With her team of investigative correspondents, journalist and former NBC national news correspondent, Hall, delves into different criminal cases to discover what exactly happened, why the crime happened and the investigation that was involved. With help from various sources, Hall and her team attempt to get to the bottom of some of Americas crimes, to give a voice to the victims and to help those who have been affected by the events.

programme.title: Murder Comes to Town
programme.desc: Tune in and hear the real-life stories of gruesome crimes that occured in small towns across America. Small towns are often synonymous with peaceful and care-free life. But seemingly peaceful places mentioned in this series have become known for its shocking murders. Following the first person accounts of investigators and townsfolk, each episode unravels the crazy rumors and terrifying truths behind unthinkable crimes and follows police as they put together each clue in an attempt to bring the culprit to justice.

programme.title: James Pattersons Murder Is Forever
programme.desc: James Pattersons Murder Is Forever is an American anthology series adapted from the books written by the best-selling author. Each story is based on mysterious true crime events with disturbing twists and devastating ends. These tales of murder prove that reality is often stranger than fiction. Watch the reenactments of real life gut-wrenching stories, from terrible double homicides to shocking kidnappings, and more.

programme.title: Man With A Van
programme.desc: Meredith Emerson starts the new year by hiking on Georgias Blood Mountain with her dog. When she vanishes and her dog is found 60 miles away a frantic search begins.

programme.title: Murder Decoded
programme.desc: Not every murder scene leaves behind clues in the form of bloody footprints, clothing fibers or fingerprint stains. Investigators earn their reputations by discovering evidence other than what is easy to see. This series spotlights devoted investigators who "go beyond the headlines," incorporating cutting-edge science to find the tiniest trace of evidence and understand its relevance. The forensics-driven stories are told via stylized re-enactments, showing how the best investigators work to decipher which clues mean nothing and which ones will put a killer behind bars, all to bring justice to victims loved ones.

programme.title: Murder Decoded
programme.desc: Not every murder scene leaves behind clues in the form of bloody footprints, clothing fibers or fingerprint stains. Investigators earn their reputations by discovering evidence other than what is easy to see. This series spotlights devoted investigators who "go beyond the headlines," incorporating cutting-edge science to find the tiniest trace of evidence and understand its relevance. The forensics-driven stories are told via stylized re-enactments, showing how the best investigators work to decipher which clues mean nothing and which ones will put a killer behind bars, all to bring justice to victims loved ones.

programme.title: I Almost Got Away With It
programme.desc: Different crimes, different stories one clear motive: to stay out of prison. This series profiles true stories of the accused, who tried to avoided arrest and capture for their crime. Almost getting away with it. Following these convicts and their attempts and successions of escaping American prisons after being sentenced. Some are on the run for only a week, others evade the law for years and in rare cases even for decades. What pushed these fugitives to crime and to what extent are willing to go to avoid justice.

programme.title: I Almost Got Away With It
programme.desc: Different crimes, different stories one clear motive: to stay out of prison. This series profiles true stories of the accused, who tried to avoided arrest and capture for their crime. programme.title: Shadow of Doubt
programme.desc: When it comes to crimes and killings not everything is crystal clear; perceptions on the them can be vastly different, depending on who you ask. This documentary series examines a number of complex and mystifying cases, where opposing viewpoints point to alternate suspects and culprits. We listen to differing accounts from individuals potentially involved in the crimes, whose contrasting opinions enshroud the case in a shadow of doubt, before revealing the shocking truths about each one. The series exposes what truly happened in these chilling cases, showing theres always more than meets the eye.

programme.title: Shadow of Doubt

programme.title: Diabolical: Deadly Love
programme.desc: True crime documentary series collecting stories of chilling real-life murders. These shocking tales are made even more terrifying as the perpetrators are also the loved ones of the victims. This series looks into how the events unfolded. As well as exploring the background of the cases - delving into the lives of people involved in these horrific crimes to try and discover how people can take the life of those closest to them. High school sweethearts, family men and seemingly loving wives are shown to be cold-hearted criminals with the ability to kill, acting out their murderous intent with calculated and cunning efficiency.

programme.title: Diabolical: Deadly Love
programme.desc: True crime documentary series collecting stories of chilling real-life murders. These shocking tales are made even more terrifying as the perpetrators are also the loved ones of the victims. This series looks into how the events unfolded. High school sweethearts, family men and seemingly loving wives are shown to be cold-hearted criminals with the ability to kill, acting out their murderous intent with calculated and cunning efficiency.

programme.title: Body Cam
programme.desc: Documentary series following police officers across the USA as they put their lives on the line to enforce the law. Using real footage from the officers body cameras, we show just how deadly routine checks can be, with law enforcement officials having to think on their feet and make split-second decisions to potentially save their, or someone elses, life. From knife-wielding maniacs to brutal shootouts, the series highlights the importance of our police departments. With interviews from the officers involved adding context to the footage, Body Cam Cops gives viewers unprecedented, exclusive access to what life is truly like in the line of duty.

programme.title: The Playboy Murders
programme.desc: A waitress catapults to stardom when featured in a Playboy pictorial. But after a surprise goes wrong, she becomes a victim in a double murder.

programme.title: Last Night in...
programme.desc: Investigations of real-life murders which occurred during nighttime in different towns across America. Night is the part of the day when its easiest for dangerous killers to catch their victims. Individuals who find themselves alone in the dark become targets of horrible predators who are looking for an opportunity to kill. In the morning their loved ones are looking for them desperately.

programme.title: Last Night in...
programme.desc: Investigations of real-life murders which occurred during nighttime in different towns across America. Night is the part of the day when its easiest for dangerous killers to catch their victims. Individuals who find themselves alone in the dark become targets of horrible predators who are looking for an opportunity to kill. In the morning their loved ones are looking for them desperately.

programme.title: House of Horrors: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Documentary series that tells the terrifying stories of people who were kidnapped and lived to tell their stories. Each episode reveals their awful experience from the moment of the abduction to the hours, days or months of captivity, right to the escape and recovery. Some of the cases that series tackles is abduction of the 13-year old Alicia Kozakiewicz by Scott Tyree, who had approached her in an internet chat room, the case of Marc Schiller, who was ambushed by thugs in broad daylight, the case of Teka Adams, pregnant woman who was abducted by Veronica Deramous, who had claimed to be a caseworker, case of Karen Kummerer, who was captured by her ex-boyfriend and taken on a terrifying, multi-state road trip in her own car, and many other dreadful stories.

programme.title: The Playboy Murders
programme.desc: A waitress catapults to stardom when featured in a Playboy pictorial. But after a surprise goes wrong, she becomes a victim in a double murder.
